page.title: 13A TIMBER AND BUILDING FIRM
page.content: {Pontrilas Timber and Builders {Merchants Ltd}is a private limited company which was bought by the present owners in 1947, engaged primarily in converting Rough Timber into sawn dimensions against customer's requirements using both hardwood and softwood. With the advances in{timber {preservation,}the demand for softwood is increasing at the expense of hardwood, hence their production is altering to suit. They send timber within a 300 mile radius, customer usage varying from fencing, construction industries, civil engineering, packaging, pallets and furniture. 100 staff are currently employed, drawn from the local area where possible.There is also a Builders Merchants division.
